interpretation: The "sunrise over mountains" card represents a new beginning, a fresh start, and the promise of adventure ahead. This emoji symbolizes the dawn of a new day, full of possibilities and potential. It encourages you to embrace change and take risks, as the reward will be worth it. The mountains in the background represent obstacles that may seem insurmountable, but with determination and persistence, you can overcome them. This card reminds you to stay optimistic, keep moving forward, and enjoy the journey.
